gurmukhi: pry hY pivqR hY pRnIq hY purwn hY ]
transliteration: Dare Hai Pavitra Hia Pounoot Hai Puraan Hai||
translation: He is in the Yond, He is Holy, Immaculate and Ancient.

gurmukhi: AgMj hY ABMj hY krIm hY kurwn hY ]11]171]
transliteration: Agadj Hai Abhanj Hai Daroom Hai Kuraan Hai||11||171||
translation: He is Indestructible, Invincible, Merciful and Holy like Quran. 11.171.

gurmukhi: Akwl hY Apwl hY iKAwl hY AKMf hY ]
transliteration: Akaal Hai Apaal Hai Khiaal Hai Akhannddhai||
translation: He is Non-temporal, Patronless, a Concept and Indivisible.

gurmukhi: n rog hY n sog hY n Byd hY n BMf hY ]
transliteration: Na Rog Hai Na Sog Hain Na Bhed Hai Na Bhand Hai||
translation: He is without ailment, without sorrow, without contrast and without slander.

gurmukhi: n AMg hY n rMg hY n sMg hY n swQ hY ]
transliteration: Na An Hai Na Ran Hai Na San Hai Na Saath Hai||
translation: He is limbless, colourless, comradeless and companionless.

gurmukhi: piRAw hY pivqR hY punIq hY pRmwQ hY ]12]172]
transliteration: Priaa Hai Pavitra Hai Pounoot Hai Pramaath Hai||12||172||
translation: He is Beloved, Sacred, Immaculate and the Subtle Truth. 12.172.

gurmukhi: n sIq hY n soc hY n GRwm hY n Gwm hY ]
transliteration: Na Soot Hai Na Soch Hai Na Ghraam Hai Na Ghaam Hai||
translation: He neither chilly, nor sorrowful, nor shade nor sunshine.

gurmukhi: n loB hY n moh hY n kRoD hY n kwm hY ]
transliteration: Na Lobh Hai Na Moh Hai Na Krodh Hai Na Kaam Hai||
translation: He is without greed, without attachment, without anger and without lust.

gurmukhi: n dyv hY n dYq hY n nr ko srUp hY ]
transliteration: Na Dev Hai Na Dait Hai Na Nar Ko Saroophai||
translation: He is neither god nor demon nor in he form of a human being.

gurmukhi: n Cl hY n iCdR hY n iCdR kI ibBUiq hY ]13]173]
transliteration: Na Chhal Hai Na Chhidra Hai Na Chhidra Koo Bibhoot(i) Hai||13||173||
translation: He is neither deceit nor blemish nor the substance of slander. 13.173.

gurmukhi: n kwm hY n kRoD hY n loB hY n moh hY ]
transliteration: Na Kaam Hai Na Krodh Hai Na Lobh Hai Na Moh Hai||
translation: He is without lust, anger, greed and attachment.

gurmukhi: n d√çYK hY n ByK hY n dueI hY n dRoh hY ]
transliteration: Na Dvaikh Hai Na Bhekh Hai Na Duee Hai Na Droh Hai||
translation: He is without malice, garb, duality and deception.

gurmukhi: n kwl hY n bwl hY sdIv dieAwl rUp hY ]
transliteration: Na Kaal Hai Na Baal Hai Sadoov Daeaal Roop Hai||
translation: He is deathless, childless and always Merciful Entity.

gurmukhi: AgMj hY ABMj hY ABrm hY ABUq hY ]14]174]
transliteration: Agadj Hai Abhanj Hai Abharam Hai Abhoot Hai||14||174||
translation: He is Indestructible, Invincible, Illusionless and Elementless. 14.174.
